entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -32.7°C
Wind: E 58 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
